General.Name: Shenzhen INVT Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen INVT Electric Co.,Ltd focuses on industrial automation, and energy and power businesses worldwide. The company offers industrial automation, new energy vehicles, network energy and rail transportation, industrial IoT solutions, controllers, frequency converters, servo systems, new energy vehicle powertrain system, main motor controller, auxiliary motor controller, drive motor, on-board charging power supply, charging pile, data center infrastructure, photovoltaic power generation, power management, urban rail transit traction system, construction vehicle traction system, mining vehicle traction system, train air conditioner controller, etc. It also provides low and medium voltage drive; dedicated drive; elevator control system; fieldbus; and control device, location display device, control cabinet, leveling device, floor selector; and others. In addition, the company offers motion control devices, including PLC, HMI, general servo system, hydraulic servo system, electronic control system, and other motion control products; and renewable energy products, such as on grid inverters, single-phase off grid inverter, hybrid inverter, accessories, and photovoltaic networking monitoring platform. Further, it provides uninterruptible power supply comprising modular UPS, standalone UPS, single phase UPS, 208V and 120V UPS, battery and hot swap battery cabinet, energy absorbing unit, bypass cabinet, and power. The company serves lifting, machine tools, elevators, petroleum, metal products, wires and cables, plastics, printing and packaging, textile and chemical fiber, building materials, metallurgy, coal mines, new energy vehicles, rails Transportation, power, photovoltaic, and other industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: INVT Guangming Technology Building, Shenzhen, China, 518106
